name: OPERATION: Doors 98
description:
*INCOMING MESSAGE*

Agent, we need your help!

Our biggest competitor has developed some new software. With power like that, they could do some bad stuff…

We must stop them!

Find a way into their HQ and destroy this software. Be careful, our spies report that there are some guards patrolling the area.

This message will self-destruct in 10 seconds.

 

Will you accept this mission?
